thread.title: Susan Spalluto
thread.title_full: Auto Lenders reviewed by Susan Spalluto

author: Susan Spalluto
title: Susan Spalluto
text: no hassle, michael was helpful with me figuring out what I needed as opposed to what I wanted! I went back 3 times in the first week with the silliest of question and Mike always had a smile and a laugh while helping me out. Auto lenders will be my first stop when car shopping from here on out
